author: Caity Belta
title: That‚Äôs a wrap! Here‚Äôs a look at what we all accomp... - Atlassian Community
text:
2023 ‚Äì what a year! üòÖ Before we continue on full steam ahead with 2024, we wanted to take a look back at what we all accomplished together last year and celebrate! Let‚Äôs get into some numbers‚Ä¶
 The Online Community was busy : 30,987 : People joined our online community groups. Is there a new one you‚Äôd like to join? 267 : Likes were received by our most popular article of the year . 71 : Was the percentage of questions that had an accepted answer within 48 hours. Wow! 10,763,227 : Represents how many Kudos points were earned. Keep sharing the love! ‚ù§Ô∏è Atlassian Community Events continued to rock: 843 : Atlassian Community Events were hosted globally. Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs coming up! 37,927 : Attendees showed up for Atlassian Community Events world wide. 343 : Is the current number of local chapters for Atlassian Community Events around the globe. Students learned a lot with Atlassian University: 553,778 : Training sessions were explored last year. 4,087 : Atlassian certifications were awarded. Will you tackle any this year? 3 : New Atlassian certifications became available in 2023. Check 'em out! ‚û°Ô∏è Jira Software Board Configuration , Jira Software Essentials , Atlassian Cloud Organization Administration . 17,348 : Was the number of sessions initiated for our most popular course ‚Äì Jira Software Fundamentals. 444 : People learned live with Atlassian University at Team ‚Äò23 in Las Vegas. Who‚Äôs ready for Team '24 ?
 Thanks for being a part of this community! We loved hearing about your favorite moments of 2023 and are looking forward to seeing what 2024 will bring. And speaking of‚Ä¶ what‚Äôs your 2024 Atlassian Community agenda shaping up to look like? Do you have plans to join and engage in a new community group? Answer more community questions? Are you hoping to attend more ACEs in your area? We‚Äôd love to hear what you‚Äôll be up to!
